name: gamma-timetable-extension
description: Chrome extension that extracts slide content from Gamma presentations and generates customizable timetables

scripts.build:next:offline: cd packages/web && DISABLE_GOOGLE_FONTS=1 npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:extension && npm run build:web && npm run build:shared
scripts.package: npm run build:extension && zip -r extension-release.zip packages/extension/dist
scripts.package:local: npm run build:local && zip -r extension-local.zip packages/extension/dist
scripts.package:prod: npm run build:prod && zip -r extension-production.zip packages/extension/dist
scripts.quality:test: npm run test:coverage && npm run test:e2e
scripts.quality:basic: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.test:sprint2:
npm run test:api && echo '
ðŸ“‹ Next: Run manual tests with: open tests/manual/sprint2-sync-checklist.md'
scripts.test:manual: echo 'ðŸ“‹ Manual Testing Checklist:' && echo 'File: tests/manual/sprint2-sync-checklist.md' && echo 'Open with: open tests/manual/sprint2-sync-checklist.md'
scripts.test:report:
npm run test:coverage && echo '
ðŸ“Š Test Report Generated. Open coverage/index.html to view detailed results.'
scripts.dev:web: cd packages/web && PORT=3000 npm run dev
scripts.dev:next: cd packages/web && PORT=3000 npm run dev
scripts.db:presentations: psql postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:54322/postgres -c 'SELECT id, title, user_id, gamma_url, created_at, updated_at FROM presentations ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 10;'
scripts.db:users: psql postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:54322/postgres -c 'SELECT id, email, auth_id, name, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;'
scripts.db:tokens: psql postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:54322/postgres -c 'SELECT id, device_name, auth_id, device_fingerprint, expires_at, last_used_at FROM device_tokens ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;'
scripts.db:fingerprints: psql postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:54322/postgres -c 'SELECT id, content_hash, title_normalized, slide_count, total_duration_minutes FROM slide_fingerprints ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;'
scripts.db:policies: psql postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:54322/postgres -c 'SELECT schemaname, tablename, policyname, permissive, roles, cmd FROM pg_policies ORDER BY tablename, policyname;'
scripts.db:triggers: psql postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:54322/postgres -c 'SELECT tgname, tgtype, tgfoid::regproc, tgrelid::regclass FROM pg_trigger WHERE NOT tgisinternal ORDER BY tgrelid::regclass::text;'
scripts.db:indexes: psql postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:54322/postgres -c "SELECT schemaname, tablename, indexname, indexdef FROM pg_indexes WHERE schemaname = 'public' ORDER BY tablename, indexname;"
scripts.db:functions: psql postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:54322/postgres -c "SELECT routine_name, routine_type FROM information_schema.routines WHERE routine_schema = 'public' ORDER BY routine_name;"
scripts.db:prod:tables: supabase db remote --linked sql "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'public' ORDER BY table_name;"
scripts.db:prod:functions: supabase db remote --linked sql "SELECT routine_name FROM information_schema.routines WHERE routine_schema = 'public' ORDER BY routine_name;"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run db:start" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev"
